content:
Mors seems like such a gentle person.
I saw the creatures you donated at his place,
they're being taken care of really well.

Seeing all the beautiful and spirited creatures that {me} donated to the Omni-Gallery,
I'm getting more and more excited about its completion.
Seeing how neatly you've organized all the creatures you donated to Mors in their boxes makes me even more excited to see how they'll be displayed when the Omni-Gallery is complete!
